name: Certain Borders (Unfinished)
description:
CONTROLS: 

In map:

  • LEFT & RIGHT: move around
  • UP & DOWN: doors
  • SPACEBAR: Start puzzle

In puzzle:

  • LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN: move around perimeter
  • SPACEBAR: press and keep pressing to enter square

I like this puzzle mechanic since a long time (remember this porn game where you undressed japanese girls?), and I wanted to code it. I don't have any actual ideas to make it into a game now, so here it is.

All graphics made by me, except the puzzle monsters:

Contains Guardian Monsters Artwork by Georg Eckert / limbusdev
